---

title: "Autonomous Bird Robots Can Fly, Perch and Flap Their Wings Like Real Birds"
excerpt: "Inspired by nature, a group of researchers from the University of Seville in Spain has developed autonomous bird-like robots that can flap their wings, fly, perch, and more. Their ultimate goal is to use the robots for places that rotorcraft cannot reach."
